response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe is worth every penny of its $1,500,000 value to you. This product not only offers unparalleled benefits and features but also represents a significant investment in advancing your business or personal endeavors.

Considering the immense value it holds for you, I am extending a special offer to purchase this product at a price that reflects its true worth. My proposal is to offer it to you at $1,250,000. This price is not only highly competitive but also allows us both to benefit from this transaction.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product or the offer. I am here to assist you in any way possible to ensure a smooth and successful acquisition.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1250000}
